markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Playing Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=1692)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 44</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Few undead can be called heroes, but a small number overcome the challenges of unlife to become something more. Durable and adaptable, they might even become adventurers and thrive. The tools in this section enable you to be undead as a player character
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-1693" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1696" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1698" />
name: Playing Undead
text: Playing Undead Source Book of the Dead pg. 44 Few undead can be called heroes, but a small number overcome the challenges of unlife to become something more. Durable and adaptable, they might even become adventurers and thrive. The tools in this section enable you to be undead as a player character
